mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANNOUNCE(ANN_TITLE, ANN_HEAD, ANN_CONT) VALUES (#{ANN_TITLE}, #{ANN_HEAD}, #{ANN_CONT})
mapper.select: SELECT ANN_TITLE, ANN_HEAD, ANN_DATE, ANN_CONT FROM ANNOUNCE WHERE ANN_TITLE=#{ANN_TITLE}
mapper.update: UPDATE ANNOUNCE SET ANN_HEAD=#{ANN_HEAD}, ANN_DATE=#{ANN_DATE}, ANN_CONT=#{ANN_CONT}, ANN_TITLE=#{ANN_TITLE} WHERE ANN_NUM=#{ANN_NUM}
